description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Scald module 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.1 for Drupal allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) flash_uri, (2) flash_width, or (3) flash_height in the scald_flash_scald_prerender function in providers/scald_flash/scald_flash.module; or the (4) caption in the scald_image_scald_prerender function in providers/scald_image/scald_image.module.
